scripts.test: npm run mocha && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-coffee && npm run build-jade && npm run build-static
scripts.build-clean: rm -rf dist/* && mkdir -p dist/static && rm -rf js/*
scripts.build-coffee: coffee -co js coffee && uglifyjs js/IO.js js/Qubicle.io.js js/Magica.io.js js/Zoxel.io.js js/Troxel.io.js js/Renderer.js js/Main.js -eo dist/static/troxel.min.js
scripts.build-static: cp -r static dist && mv dist/static/troxel.appcache dist
